title: Human Highway
lyrics:
I come down
from the misty mountain
I got lost
on the human highway
Take my head
refreshing fountain

Take my eyes

from what they've seen.

Take my head

and change my mind

How could people

get so unkind.



I come down

from the crooked mansion

I went lookin'

for the D.J.'s daughter

Since that day

I heard it mentioned

That my name is on the line.

Now, my name is on the line

How could people

get so unkind.



Now, my name is on the line

How could people

get so unkind.



I come down

from the misty mountain

I got lost

on the human highway

Take my head

refreshing fountain

Take my eyes

from what they've seen.

Take my head

and change my mind

How could people

get so unkind.
